sentence: But the National Right to Life Committee is endorsing Republican Senate candidate Herschel Walker, who has been outspoken in his support to outlaw abortion as he runs this year to challenge Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock of Georgia in a crucial Senate showdown that could determine whether the GOP wins back the chamber's majority.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Georgia Senate race: Herschel Walker lands endorsement of leading anti-abortion group

sentence: Georgia deserves a pro-life senator like Herschel Walker who is committed to building a culture of life, Tobias said in the NRLCs endorsement announcement.
author: Natalie Prieb
title: National Right to Life endorses Herschel Walker

sentence: Source: AP Photo/Ben Gray Georgia Senate candidate and former professional football player Herschel Walker said on Wednesday that he supports restrictions on abortion without exceptions for rape, incest or the health of the mother.
author: Madeline Leesman
title: Herschel Walker on Abortion: 'There's No Exception in My Mind'
